refnamediv.refpurpose: decode and encode Signed Certificate Timestamp lists in TLS wire format

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The SCT_LIST and SCT functions are very similar to the i2d and d2i family of functions, except that they convert to and from TLS wire format, as described in RFC 6962. See d2i_SCT_LIST for more information about how the parameters are treated and the return values.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: All of the functions have return values consistent with those stated for d2i_SCT_LIST and i2d_SCT_LIST .

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: These functions were added in OpenSSL 1.1.0.
